=== NEWS ARTICLE ===
Title: Silver rate today in India: 10 gm, 100 gm, 1 kg prices in Delhi, Jaipur, Mumbai, Bengaluru, other cities
Source: LiveMint - Markets
Published: 2025-12-28 04:42
Related Stocks: General Market News
Categories: markets

Summary:
Silver rate today in Delhi for 10 gm coins is ₹2,161, for 100 gm coins is ₹24,614, whereas for 1 kg bar is ₹2,40,150.

Sentiment: neutral
URL: https://www.livemint.com/market/commodities/silver-rate-today-in-india-10-gm-100-gm-1-kg-prices-in-delhi-jaipur-mumbai-bengaluru-other-cities-11766895530711.html
